title: "AI has helped to better understand how human brain performs face recognition"
excerpt: "Skoltech scientists Anh-Huy Phan and Andrzej Cichocki, with their colleagues from the US and Japan, Sidney Lehky and Keiji Tanaka, decided to better understand how the visual cortex processes and stores information related to face recognition. Their approach was based on the idea that a human face can be conceptually represented as a collection ..."
